data.description:
Dance Central™ is back! Designed from the ground up for VR, Dance Central immerses you and your friends in the world’s best dance club experience where you are the life of the party and nobody steps on your toes.
 
Dance Central includes a 32 song soundtrack featuring chart-toppers from the 1970s through to today’s biggest hits. With two difficulty levels and unique routines choreographed for each song, there’s plenty to keep you dancing all night.
 
Dance Central also features the franchise’s first dive into synchronous online multiplayer. Customize your look, take an in-game selfie and then meet up with friends in the multiplayer lounge to party, chat, and dance your hearts out. With cross-play, you can compete against your friends on both the Oculus Quest and Rift Platform in free-for-all or team dance games to see who's the best in the crew.
 
Dance Central supports cross-buy. Buy once, play on both Oculus Quest and Rift Platform.

changelog.change_log:
Version 1.2.1 (121011401)
　　- Three new songs are now available and FREE to play! Enjoy these Harmonix Friends & Family tracks:
　　　　* James Landino ft. Noelle LeBlanc “Break For Me” 
　　　　* M-Cue “Out Whole Night
　　　　* Shocked Laura “Fall Apart”

Version 1.2.0 (121011301)
　　- The Fitness app is now available on your in-game cellphone! Track your daily, weekly, monthly, and overall calorie burn while you dance. See your highest burning song, as well as stats from your last played song.
　　　　- Displays of calories burned in Dance Central are estimates only and will vary by song/level and other individual factors such as height and weight. Individual results may vary. Please see and follow the Health and Safety Warnings for your device at oculus.com/warnings.

　　- NPC challenges are now available! Miss Aubrey, Emilia, Hart, Oblio, and Mo will now text and challenge you to try and beat their score. Good luck!

Version 1.1.1 (121011101)
　　- The in-game DLC Store has been updated to include three more playable tracks:
　　　　* Ellie Goulding “Burn” 
　　　　* Flo Rida ft. Sage The Gemini and Lookas "GDFR”
　　　　* will.i.am ft. Britney Spears “Scream & Shout”

Version 1.1.0 (121011001)
- The DLC Store is now available – access the DLC store through your in-game phone to purchase these new playable tracks:
　　* Enrique Iglesias ft. Sean Paul, Descemer Bueno, Gente De Zona “Bailando”
　　* John Legend “All Of Me (Tiësto’s Birthday Treatment Remix [Radio Edit])”
　　* PSY “Gangnam Style”
- Phone size options – you can now choose between three sizes for the in-game phone in the Settings.
- Improved audio mix and quality.
- Improved stability when playing long sections of songs in the Studio.
- Fixed issue where songs in the Lounge could occasionally stop rotating, causing the same song to repeat.
- Crowd members are now visible when taking selfies.
- Flashcard accuracy fixes across a handful of songs.
- Phone interface tweaks and improvements.
- A variety of polish, stability, performance, and bug fixes.

Version 1.0.1 (1206123)
- Larger, easier-to-read phone interface on Oculus Quest
- Increased audio volume on Oculus Quest
- Accepting invites from Oculus Home no longer causes issues
- Fixed a rare issue with minigame countdown timer displaying '8' for too long in the Lounge
- Fixed an issue with songs not rotating occasionally while in the Lounge
- Various bug fixes, optimizations, and polish
